Today in Caithness, surf is looking solid with 3 ft @10s WNW swell across multiple spots, including Point of Ness and Dunnet Bay. Winds are fresh at 15 mph SSE, creating clean conditions. Tomorrow, conditions drop as the swell shifts to 3 ft @6s SSW with strong winds at 30 mph, making it poor. The day after continues the trend with similar poor conditions. Best: today.
